name: Jewel Quest III Saved Game
summary: A JQ3SAVEGAME file is a saved game file created by Jewel Quest III, a tile-matching puzzle video game published by iWin. It contains a record of a player's progress in Jewel Quest III. JQ3SAVEGAME files cannot be used to migrate saved Jewel Quest III games from one computer to another.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
